summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Meat, Poultry, Rabbit and Fish; merging the regulation of meat and the regulation of poultry, rabbit, and fish; abolishing the Licensure of Facilities Handling Meat, Poultry, Rabbit, and Fish and providing permits for such establishments; providing for fees, abolishing the Meat Inspection Fund; repealing Ordinances 94465, as amended by Ordinances 94567, 95906, 96110, 96788, 97794, 100445, 102638, 106025, 106058, 106295, 106966, 107158, 107776, 108076, and 108147; and repealing Ordinance 80028 as amended by Ordinances 80601, 85679, 88241, 88581, 92085, 96125, 96787, 102626, 106025, 106060, 107158 and 108147.
